com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query

Interface Query

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BackendQuery<Q>, ElementQuery<R,B>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseQuery, BaseVertexCentricQuery, GraphCentricQuery, IndexQuery, IndexQueryBuilder, JointIndexQuery, JointIndexQuery.Subquery, KeyRangeQuery, KeySliceQuery, KVQuery, MultiKeySliceQuery, RawQuery, SliceQuery, VertexCentricQuery

    public interface Query
    Standard Query interface specifying that a query may have a limit.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NO_LIMIT
